This game is pretty fun, really high learning curve in my opinion. My biggest complaint is that I have to wait to play competitive matchmaking, because my teammates unanimously decided to kick someone in consecutive matches for either throwing or griefing the game. Pretty retarded if you ask me.

Valve does not care about this game and they do not care about players. This game has so much potential that is killed by lowered server tick rates and the high amount of cheaters. There is premium options such as ESEA of faceit but the average user should just have a generally better experience by hardware banning or implementing a better anti-cheat system.
